title: Rogue Device Containment
description: A network access control (NAC) system alerts that an unauthorized device (e.g., a personal laptop) has connected to a corporate network port.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the NAC alert and identify the device's MAC address and the switch port it is connected to.
tasks.expected_outcome: Responder retrieves the key details of the unauthorized connection.

tasks.description: Use the NAC system to automatically move the device's port into a quarantined VLAN with no access to internal resources.
tasks.expected_outcome: The rogue device is successfully isolated from the corporate network.

tasks.description: Create a ticket for the physical security team to go to the port's location and investigate the unauthorized device.
tasks.expected_outcome: Responder coordinates with physical security to address the physical aspect of the incident.
